product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Low Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Low Bike Socks for men are loaded with the small details that will make these a go-to when reaching in your sock drawer. Pearl Izumi Elite Transfer polyester/nylon/spandex yarns wick moisture and dry quickly for exceptional comfort. Anatomical arch compression delivers a no-slip performance fit. Mesh ventilation over top of foot also aids moisture transfer and comfort. Flat toe-seam construction provides superior comfort over your toes so you won't get blisters in snug-fitting cycling shoes. Pearl Izumi Elite Low Bike Socks for men feature a low cuff height.
short_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Low Bike Socks for men are loaded with the small details that will make these a go-to when reaching in your sock drawer.
